explains: n. 历史学家，史学工作者

sentences.en: Historian Michael Beschloss debunks a few myths.
sentences.cn: 历史学家迈克尔·贝斯切罗斯揭露了一些神话的真相。

sentences.en: Although not formally trained as an art historian, he is widely respected for his knowledge of the period.
sentences.cn: 虽然他不是科班出身的艺术史学家，但他对这一时期的知识却普遍为人尊重。

sentences.en: One such historian was Escott, who emphasized regional and economic conflict among Southerners.
sentences.cn: 埃斯科特就是这样一位历史学家，他强调南方人之间的地区和经济冲突。
